Met Downscaling
===============

## Subdaily Data

examples:

* NARR 3 hourly
* CRU-NCEP 6 hourly

```{r}
library(PEcAn.data.atmosphere)
subdaily.nc <- nc_open(system.file("extdata/urbana_subdaily_narr_test.nc", package = "PEcAn.data.atmosphere"))
subdaily.cf <- load.cfmet(met.nc = subdaily.nc, lat = 39.75, lon = -87.25, start.date = "1979-01-01", end.date = "1979-06-30")
```
